## MapViewUtils.Attitude interface

The anti clockwise rotation of an object along the axes of its tangent space, with itself as origin.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
interface Attitude 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [pitch](./harp-mapview.mapviewutils.attitude.pitch.md) | number | Rotation of the object along its horizontal axis. |
|  [roll](./harp-mapview.mapviewutils.attitude.roll.md) | number | Rotation of the object along its forward axis. |
|  [yaw](./harp-mapview.mapviewutils.attitude.yaw.md) | number | Rotation of the object along its vertical axis. |
